name: toggle-grayscale
title: Toggle Grayscale
description: Instantly toggle your Mac's Color Filters accessibility feature on/off without opening System Settings. Switch between color modes with a single command.
author: zcsabbagh

commands.name: toggle-grayscale
commands.title: Toggle Grayscale
commands.description: Quickly toggle macOS Color Filters. Perfect for users who frequently switch between color modes for accessibility, screen reading, or working in low-light conditions. Saves time by eliminating the need to navigate through System Settings menus.

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
